Interface UserDisplay

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantDisplay, ManagerDisplay, OfficerDisplay
public interface UserDisplay
Boundary.

This UserDisplayis a interface representing a user display for different user roles in the system. Provides methods for showing user-specific menus and changing passwords.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    changeUserPassword(Scanner scanner, User user)
    Allows the user to change their password.
    void
    showDisplay()
    Displays the interface or menu relevant to the user role.

  • Method Details

    • showDisplay

      void showDisplay()
      Displays the interface or menu relevant to the user role. Implementing classes must define their own version of this method.

    • changeUserPassword

      default void changeUserPassword(Scanner scanner, User user)
      Allows the user to change their password. Prompts the user for the current password and a new password. Validates the current password and updates it if correct.
      Parameters:
      scanner - the Scanner object for reading user input
      user - the user whose password is to be changed
